title: (x) PONYO Billing Typeface ID Request - Albertus {Jan}
content:
I am looking for the name of the serif typeface that the upper billing of the PONYO one-sheet is set in.

You can find an example attached or via the link below.

[http://www.impawards.com/intl/japan/2008/gake\_no\_ue\_no\_ponyo\_ver3.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019063558/http:/www.impawards.com/intl/japan/2008/gake_no_ue_no_ponyo_ver3.html "http://www.impawards.com/intl/japan/2008/gake\_no\_ue\_no\_ponyo\_ver3.html")

Thanks,

- corey
